name: Dark Web Whatsapp Theme
description:
This is a Dark Web Whatsapp Theme, 
If you find anything un-styled or a other issue please let me know.
additional_info:
Version 1.0  Date: 05-12-2017

Version 1.1 Date: 09-12-2017
Black background for Emoji-menu (Introduced background collor issue for the Emoji)
Different Start Screen Logo
Watching your own profile bug fix. (Image now is properly placed at the top.)
New Send Received and read Checks colors
Checks left Menu Send, Received and Read
Brighter blue message Received checks.
White visable Send and Received checks
Waiting for send (Timepiece) Color
Started adding comments for better understanding of the CSS.
Deleted useless code
Archived chats Icon has now a dark background color.
Left Chat Menu Photo Icon Color
Left Chat Menu GIF Icon Color
Left Chat Menu Video Icon Color
Left Chat Menu Search Bordor color
Left Chat Menu Search Icon Color
All Names in group chat are now white
Emoij Searchbar is now dark
Watching someone's Profile Picture now is properly themed also.
Watching your own profile Edit button colors
Watching your own profile Menu height
Watching your own profile Edit Icons
Settings Icons
Search bar Chats Bordor color
Search bar Search Icon Color
New group button at New chat Menu now is styled
Creating a group menu now is styled Searchbar included.
New chat Searchbar Bordor
New chat Searchbar Icon
Fixed the displaced avatars
Images with star, background color.
Sign-on screen now themed

Version 1.2 Date 16-01-2018
Styled lots of things lost track. 
Tried optimizing and compressing CSS to make it Light Weight Stylish wouldn't let me.

Hot-fix - 19-01-2018
Styled all Default Icons
Updated Main Screenshot. 
Updated Green Colors in Start screen to be dark themed.

Hot-fix 10-02-2018
Styling has been fixed. Whatsapp changed the css yesterday.

Another Hot-Fix 13-02-2018
Found some styling also to be missing.

Another Hot-Fix 18-02-2018
Found some white spot. 
Also redid the send and received document styling.

25-02-2018
Send And Receive links are now styled better.

08-03-2018 
Fix for Style update

11-03-2018 
Sending an image style fix.

28-03-2018 
Emoij Panel Fix

10-04-2018
Phone not reachable styled.

16-04-2018
Emoij Bar Styling fixed,

07-05-2018
Fixed Login Screen

13-05-2018
Fixed removed message Icons

26-05-2018
Fixed message tails
Fixed image with star page

28-07-2018:
Styled the new input field
Styled the new Emoji Classes.

29-07-2018
Styled the Emoji Input field to look more like text input field. 
Minified the CSS.

14-08-2018
Response color fix
Button color fix when watching media
Emoji Panel Fix
Minified the CSS.

Version 1.15 - Date:15-08-2018
Updated attachment icons to be gray instead of colored. 
Updated a few buttons from light blueish to gray.  (When watching media)
Updated generic Doc Icon.
Made Links with metadata more readable.

Version 1.15 - Date 19-08-2018
You can now see the date when checking your messages with star. 
When trying to block a contact the Add Contact User button is visible again.
Hover on several buttons are black on white now. Instead of Green on white. 
Changed the background color of gif's.

Version 1.16 - Date 20-08-2018
Quite a few Icons are visible again. 
Selecting group managers is better styled now.
Sending a picture with the camera doesn't blind you anymore. (Changed background from white to darkgray)
Initial startup is not white anymore.

Version 1.17 - Date 19-02-2019
Well whatsapp broke quite allot of stuff again. just now found the time to edit the theme again (back from exams)

Version 1.18 - Date 25-02-2019
Styled an object (The message you get when someone is using a new phone.)

Version 1.19 - Date 04-03-2019
Updated styling on link previews.

Version 2.0 - Date 01-06-2019
Everything was broken, this is the first fix. 
Allot of CSS clean up has been done since I started from scratch again.

Version 2.1 - Date 03-06-2019
Second fix applied simple chatting should be fully supported.
(Opening images and other menus will stil be very bright)

Version 2.1.1 - Date 19-02-2020
Just a few hotfixes

Version 2.2 - Date 27-03-2020 
Had to do a redo because of whatsapp.

Version 2.2.1 - Date 18-06-2020
Hotfix thursday
